content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position (0, 0)) with fuel: coal (18), status: NO_INGREDIENTS, warnings: no ingredients to smelt.

### Second Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position (2, 0)) with fuel: coal (6), status: NO_INGREDIENTS, warnings: no ingredients to smelt.

### Copper Plate Mine
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position unknown) and a Furnace (position unknown).

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling Machine (position unknown) and Inserter (position unknown) that puts into the Assembling Machine.
- Beltgroup (position unknown) that connects the Furnace (position unknown) to the Assembling Machine (position unknown).

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting into a full furnace
- Ensure the furnace has enough space in its inventory before attempting to insert items. Check the current inventory capacity and the number of items being inserted.

### Errors when extracting from an empty furnace
- Confirm that there are enough items in the furnace to extract before attempting to extract. 

### Errors when attempting to insert into furnaces with no ingredients
- Make sure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt before attempting to insert items.

### Errors when crafting with insufficient materials
- Always check your inventory to ensure you have enough materials for crafting before initiating the crafting process.
